ygData.subject: Re: NUNCHUCKS! COOL!!!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: I know h2h delay of 30 doesnt make sence...... but thats the way Verant programmed it so thats how we have to live with it.
ygData.messageBody:
I know h2h delay of 30 doesnt make sence...... but thats the way Verant
programmed it so thats how we have to live with it.

Kplatte wrote:

> From: "Kplatte" <asmo@...>
>
> Ok that doesn't make sense! Your fist has a 30 delay then how can some
> weapons have a delay below 30?
> Would think fist should be the fastest delay!! Hmmm doesn't seem right that
> holding a weapon makes you attack faster....
